New Records: The Texas Rangers won their first World Series, securing their first championship
Key Match Events: The game was a blowout with the Texas Rangers clinching early and the final out drawing 14.27 million viewers
Pre-Game Insights: The series faced low viewership due to the teams' limited national appeal and scheduling on a traditionally low-viewership night
Post-Match Reflections: The Texas Rangers celebrated their first championship, and the World Series saw the eighth straight year of beating all entertainment programs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series continued to outperform all entertainment programs, with the most-watched event four of five nights
Others: The World Series saw a 23% decline in viewership compared to the previous year and the shortest series in years
